resources.name: Login
resources.description:
Validates the email and password, and returns user data in the body and a JWT toke in the header (auth-token)

```response:200
{
  "_id": "61aff5158ba011d49429a131",
  "user": "nik",
  "email": "nik@mail.com",
  "avatar": ""
}
```

resources.name: Register
resources.description:
**Prams:**

- **email**: email of the new user (emails are used for authorization - Login)
- **name**: display name of the new user
- **password**: password used for authentication

```response:200
{
  "email": "nik@mail.com",
  "name": "Nik",
  "_id": "61aa5fab8a661bd1b1b68318"
}
```

resources.name: Get avatar
Add todo
resources.description:
**Prams:**

- **todoGroupId**: ID of the group into which the todo will be added
- **name**: name/title of the todo
- **description**: todo description
- **sharedWith**: array of emails of users
- **tags**: array of tag IDs

```response:200
{
  "_id": "61aff9ee1860ff9bdcaea358",
  "name": "Finish this documentation",
  "description": "This is boring but important",
  "status": false,
  "tags": [
    {
      "_id": "61aff9711860ff9bdcaea34e",
      "name": "Important stuff",
      "color": "#ff00ff"
    }
  ]
}
```

resources.name: Add todo group
resources.description:
**Prams:**
- __name__: name of the todo group
- __permissions__: permissions used by the users that the group is shared with _[**0**: view, **1**: edit, **2**: delete]_
- __color__: color used for the group
- __shareWith__: array of emails


```response:200
{
  "_id": "61aff91a1860ff9bdcaea346",
  "name": "My group 1",
  "permissions": 0,
  "sharedWith": [
    {
      "_id": "61aff8b21860ff9bdcaea33e",
      "name": "tim",
      "email": "tim@mail.com"
    }
  ],
  "color": "#FF00AA",
  "owner": {
    "_id": "61aff8a91860ff9bdcaea338",
    "name": "nik",
    "email": "nik@mail.com",
    "avatar": ""
  },
  "todos": []
}
```

resources.name: Get todo group by ID
Get todos shared with user
Delete todo
resources.description:
**Prams:**

- **id [path]**: ID of the todo to be deleted

resources.name: Delete todo group
resources.description:
**Prams:**

- **id [path]**: ID of the todo group to be deleted

resources.name: Edit todo
resources.description:
**Prams:**

- **id [path]**: ID of the todo to be edited
- **name**: name/title of the todo
- **description**: todo description
- **sharedWith**: array of emails of users
- **status**: status of the task (completed, not completed)
- **tags**: array of tag IDs

```response:200
{
  "_id": "61aff9ee1860ff9bdcaea358",
  "name": "Finish this documentation",
  "description": "This is boring but important",
  "status": true,
  "tags": [
    {
      "_id": "61aff9711860ff9bdcaea34e",
      "name": "Important stuff",
      "color": "#ff00ff"
    }
  ]
}
```

resources.name: Edit todo group
Get all todo groups
Get todo by ID
resources.description:
**Prams:**

- **id [path]**: ID of the todo

```response:200
{
  "_id": "61aff9ee1860ff9bdcaea358",
  "name": "Finish this documentation",
  "description": "This is boring but important",
  "status": false,
  "tags": [
    {
      "_id": "61aff9711860ff9bdcaea34e",
      "name": "Important stuff",
      "color": "#ff00ff"
    }
  ]
}
```

resources.name: Add todo tag
resources.description:
**Prams:**

- **name**: name of the tag
- **color**: color used for the tag (HEX code)

```response:200
{
  "_id": "61aff9711860ff9bdcaea34e",
  "name": "Important stuff",
  "color": "#ff00ff"
}
```

resources.name: Delete todo tag
resources.description:
**Prams:**

- **id [path]**: ID of the todo tag to be deleted

resources.name: Get all todo tags
Edit todo tag
resources.description:
**Prams:**
- **id [path]**: ID of the todo ta to be edited
- **name**: name of the tag
- **color**: color used for the tag (HEX code)

```permisions:200
{
  "_id": "61aff9711860ff9bdcaea34e",
  "name": "Important stuff (renamed)",
  "color": "#ff00aa"
}
```

resources.name: Add event tag
resources.description:
**Prams:**

- **name**: name of the tag
- **color**: color used for the tag (HEX code)

**On registration a default tag is created for every user**


```response:200
{
  "_id": "61affc7c1860ff9bdcaea3b2",
  "name": "My event tag 1",
  "color": "#FFAAFF"
}
```

resources.name: Add event
resources.description:
**Prams:**
- __name__: name of the event
- __description__: description of the event
- __start__: epoch of start of the event (first start if the event is recurring)
- __end__: epoch of the end of the event (first end if event is recurring)
- __repeatType__: interval of the recurrence of teh event _[**-1**: none, **0**: daily, **1**: weekly, **2**: monthly, **3**: yearly]_
- __repeatFor__: how many time will the event repeated (related to _repeateType_)
- __shareWith__: array of emails
- __eventTagId__: Id of the tag used for the event

```response:200
{
  "_id": "61affcef1860ff9bdcaea3b9",
  "name": "My event 1",
  "owner": {
    "_id": "61aff8a91860ff9bdcaea338",
    "name": "nik",
    "email": "nik@mail.com",
    "avatar": ""
  },
  "description": "Event description",
  "start": "2021-12-07T20:01:34.984Z",
  "end": "2022-01-04T23:00:00.000Z",
  "repeatType": 0,
  "repeatFor": 0,
  "tag": {
    "_id": "61affc7c1860ff9bdcaea3b2",
    "name": "My event tag 1",
    "color": "#FFAAFF"
  },
  "sharedWith": [
    {
      "_id": "61aff8b21860ff9bdcaea33e",
      "name": "tim",
      "email": "tim@mail.com",
      "avatar": ""
    }
  ]
}
```

    "_id": "61aff8a91860ff9bdcaea338",

  "start": "2021-12-07T20:01:34.984Z",

resources.name: Delete event tag
resources.description:
**Prams:**

Delete the selected event tag. All the events with this tag will be changed to the default tag.

- **id [path]**: ID of the event tag to be deleted

resources.name: Delete event
resources.description:
**Prams:**

Deletes the selected event.

- **id [path]**: ID of the event to be deleted

resources.name: Update event
resources.description:
**Prams:**
- **id [path]**: ID of the event to be deleted
- __name__: name of the event
- __description__: description of the event
- __start__: epoch of start of the event (first start if the event is recurring)
- __end__: epoch of the end of the event (first end if event is recurring)
- __repeatType__: interval of the recurrence of teh event _[**-1**: none, **0**: daily, **1**: weekly, **2**: monthly, **3**: yearly]_
- __repeatFor__: how many time will the event repeated (related to _repeateType_)
- __shareWith__: array of emails
- __eventTagId__: Id of the tag used for the event


```response:200
{
  "_id": "61affcef1860ff9bdcaea3b9",
  "name": "My event 1 (Renamed)",
  "owner": {
    "_id": "61aff8a91860ff9bdcaea338",
    "name": "nik",
    "email": "nik@mail.com",
    "avatar": ""
  },
  "description": "Event description",
  "start": "2021-12-07T20:01:34.984Z",
  "end": "2022-01-04T23:00:00.000Z",
  "repeatType": 0,
  "repeatFor": 0,
  "tag": {
    "_id": "61affc7c1860ff9bdcaea3b2",
    "name": "My event tag 1 (Renamed)",
    "color": "#FFAbAAA"
  },
  "sharedWith": []
}
```

resources.name: Update event tag
resources.description:
**Prams:**
- **id [path]**: ID of the event tag to be edited
- **name**: name of the tag
- **color**: color used for the tag (HEX code)

**The autogenerated Default tag can't be edited**

```response:200
{
  "_id": "61affc7c1860ff9bdcaea3b2",
  "name": "My event tag 1 (Renamed)",
  "color": "#FFAbAAA"
}
```
